attributes.additional_details: Life is too short for people to work the majority of their lives. As proven by studies, productivity is increased with a shorter working week. All change starts small and this will improve the lives of many
attributes.background: I would like the government to change from 5 working days to 4 working days and keep the same wage

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a very similar action:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/317794

UK law places limits on the total amount of time someone can work during a week and the minimum amount they can be paid an hour, but it doesn't specify how many or which days of the week they have to work. This would be a decision for employers.
